revisions.*:
The '''Initial Deck''' in ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories]]'' is the Deck the player begins the game with. Its contents are randomized.

== Contents ==
The Initial Deck is made up of forty cards, selected from seven pools as follows:

{| class="wikitable"
! Pool
! Quantity
|-
| [[#ATK + DEF < 1100 monsters|ATK + DEF < 1100 monsters]]
| 16
|-
| [[#1100 ≤ ATK + DEF < 1600 monsters|1100 ≤ ATK + DEF < 1600 monsters]]
| 16
|-
| [[#1600 ≤ ATK + DEF < 2100 monsters|1600 ≤ ATK + DEF < 2100 monsters]]
| 4
|-
| [[#2100 ≤ ATK + DEF monsters|2100 ≤ ATK + DEF monsters]]
| 1
|-
| [[#Magic Card|Magic Card]]
| 1
|-
| [[#Field Magic Card|Field Magic Card]]
| 1
|-
| [[#Equip Card|Equip Card]]
| 1
|}

The contents of each pool are listed below, along with their probability of being included.
